reason.html: See Issue #238

description.raw:
Per issue #213, install `ros/atlas_description/manifest.xml` to `share/drcsim-X.Y/ros/atlas_description`.  Also make the manifest.xml files in the subdirectories under `share/drcsim-X.Y/gazebo_models/atlas_description` into real ROS manifests.

There's more manifest cleanup to be done in the install tree, but I'm not doing it now because it's not apparently urgent.
